Mycelium Bitcoin Wallet Mycelium Add New Account Add Unrelated Account Import Master Seed Enter Word List Mycelium supports HD Accounts and Single Address Accounts. All created HD Accounts are based on the same Master Seed. In order to add a Single Address Account based on a private key or a read-only address, please click the Advanced button below. Scan Bitcoin address, private key or HD-Account. Scan Master Seed from Mycelium Backup You can only have one unused HD Account. Import Bitcoin address or private key from clipboard. Create Master Seed from Word List Scan Advanced Clipboard Enter Word List Add HD Account Close Sending %1$s Receiving %1$s %d Confirmations Send Receive Private key deleted. Account deleted. 0.00 0.00 %1$s Enter Recipient Address Recipient Address Amount: Amount Enter Amount Spendable: %1$s Spendable: %1$s %2$s QR Code My Addresses Insufficient funds Insufficient funds to pay fee The amount you are sending is too small Unable to build transaction Amount too small Miner fee: Miner Fee Synchronizing Failed to broadcast transaction Failed to broadcast transaction.\nWould you like to queue the transaction so it gets sent automatically once you get online? Transaction sent. Export account keys Only copy this key in a secure environment.\nAnyone who has access to it gains control over all current and in the future available bitcoin for this account.\n\nLong-press here to show the \nQR-Code xpub ypub zpub xprv P2SH Legacy (P2PKH) P2WPKH yprv zprv Backup Copy to Clipboard Copy address to Clipboard Copy amount to Clipboard Copy Private Key to Clipboard Copied to clipboard Private Key Bitcoin Address %2$s %1$s No Server Connection No Network Connection Invalid Bitcoin URI Unrecognized format Unrecognized private key format This page shows your transaction history.\n\nThere are currently no transactions to show. This page shows your address book.\n\nYour address book is empty. Name OK Cancel Edit Address Label Enter Address Label Enter Transaction Label Set Label Show Details Transaction Details Hash Confirmed Date Inputs Outputs In block #%1$d No Yes PIN Settings Randomize PIN pad Considerably improves security by randomizing PIN pad layout Clear PIN Code Clear the current PIN code Set PIN Code Set a PIN code that restricts access to sending coins, exporting private keys, and changing the PIN code Fiat Currencies Fiat Currency (%1$s) Select the local fiat currency Exchange source Exchange Source (%1$s) Select the source for obtaining exchange rates between Bitcoin and fiat currencies Cryptocurrency denomination Cryptocurrency denomination (%1$s) Set preferred Bitcoin denomination\nBTC, mBTC, or μBTC Advanced Settings Socks Proxy Socks Proxy (Enabled) Socks Proxy (Not enabled) Communicate through restrictive firewalls or through Tor using Orbot. Enter a host name and port, e.g. \'localhost:9050\' To improve your privacy Require PIN on start Settings You cannot set a PIN before you have made a backup of your master seed. Invalid PIN code Enter PIN Code PIN code cleared Enter new PIN Code The two PIN codes do not match PIN code set Confirm PIN Code v%1$s Are you sure that you want to delete this address from your address book? Add to address book Edit Delete Payment Request You are about to export sensitive data of the selected account.\n\nAnyone who gains access to these keys can either take possession of the bitcoin it controls or gain information that might subvert your privacy.\n\nDo you want to continue? You should backup the master seed of your wallet.\nA backup of your master seed allows you to restore your funds stored on your HD accounts if your device is lost or damaged.\n\nDo you want to do this now? Make a Backup of your Private Key!\n\nIt will take you 2 minutes but can save millions! Having a proper backup is a cornerstone when managing your digital assets or Bitcoin funds.\n\nDO NOT USE Mycelium without creating and verifying backup of all your accounts - if you lose your smartphone and have no backup your bitcoins and digital assets will be lost forever.\n\nDo you want to proceed? Warning: Exporting the private account data to your clipboard exposes it to all other apps on your device.\n\nNote: It is not enough to store your private data on the clipboard, you also have to paste it somewhere safe.\n\nDo you want to continue? Private Key Found on Clipboard Public Key Found on Clipboard The clipboard contains a private key.\nDo you want to clear the clipboard? The clipboard contains a public key.\nDo you want to clear the clipboard? 1 BTC ~ %1$s %2$s Exchange rate not available for %1$s Note: You are sending to one of your own addresses. Warning: Your wallet does not have the private key for this address.\nYou cannot spend coins received unless you have the private key elsewhere. Add Address Scan Bitcoin address. Get Bitcoin address from clipboard. Max Get private key from: Cold Storage Cold Storage Spending You are about to spend from a private key in cold storage. This could be a private key paper backup or a private key slip from a Bitcoin ATM. Following Formats are supported:\nPrivate Key, Master Seed, xPriv Key\n\nOnce the transaction has been sent every trace of it will be erased from the internal memory. Only delete the private key and keep as a read-only account Manual Entry \? Bitcoin HD Other Archived (Empty) Activate Archive Archive an account if you don\'t intend to use it for a long time.

Archived account won\'t be monitored. That means you can not work with this account while having its label in your accounts list.

This feature adds privacy and security, keeping your balance and access to funds secure.

To activate archived account select it from accounts list "Archived" section, tap on the menu button in the top right corner of the screen and select "Activate".

Do you want to archive account \"%1$s\" holding %2$s and account \"%3$s\" holding %4$s? Archive an account if you don\'t intend to use it for a long time.

Archived account won\'t be monitored. That means you can not work with this account while having its label in your accounts list.

This feature adds privacy and security, keeping your balance and access to funds secure.

To activate archived account select it from accounts list "Archived" section, tap on the menu button in the top right corner of the screen and select "Activate".

Do you want to archive account \"%1$s\" holding %2$s? Welcome to Mycelium Do you want to restore a backup, or create a new wallet? Create New Restore Backup Archived Activated You need to keep at least one active account. Please wait … Synchronizing, please wait … The address book has another address with that name The name is already in use for another account Tapping the QR code may improve scanning Paste Your network connection seems to be slow.\nWith a little patience we might get there… 1Address1234\n567890abcdef\nghijklmnop Signing Transaction Broadcasting Transaction The transaction was rejected by the network. This indicates that your wallet is out of sync Failed to broadcast transaction due to a double spend or malleability issue. Enter Bitcoin Address Invalid Bitcoin Address Bitcoin Address Valid Redirecting to a block explorer Enter your local currency Using address from clipboard My Accounts Address Book Delete Account? Do you want to delete account \"%1$s\" holding %2$s and \"%3$s\" holding %4$s? Do you want to delete accounts \"%1$s\" and \"%2$s\"? Do you want to delete account \"%1$s\" holding %2$s? Do you want to delete account \"%1$s\" Are You Sure? This cannot be undone!\n\nCurrent address:\n%1$s\n\nIt contains %2$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\nCurrent addresses:\n%1$s\n\nIt contains %2$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\n%1$s\n\nCurrent address:\n%2$s\n\nIt contains %3$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\n%1$s\n\nCurrent addresses:\n%2$s\n\nIt contains %3$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\nCurrent address:\n%1$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\nCurrent addresses:\n%1$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\n%1$s\n\nCurrent address:\n%2$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? This cannot be undone!\n\n%1$s\n\nCurrent addresses:\n%2$s\n\nDo you want to delete it? Verify Backup Verify Private Key Backup Having a proper backup is a cornerstone when managing your Bitcoin and digital assets funds.\n\nBy verifying your backup you make sure that your backup works and that you do not lose your funds if your Android device is lost or damaged. Verify your backup by scanning the private key or master seed QR code.\nSeveral formats are accepted, including the Mycelium encrypted paper backup. Verify private key backup by taking the private key from the clipboard. You have %1$s keys that have never been verified. You have 1 key that has never been verified. Your master seed has not been verified. The private key does not match any of your Bitcoin addresses. Private key backup successfully verified for the following account: \n\n%1$s\n\nAddresses:\n\n%2$s The scanned seed does not match your master seed. Backup missing Backup and Verify Having a proper backup is a cornerstone when managing your Bitcoin funds.\nYou have one or more Bitcoin private keys or a master seed where the backup has not been verified.\n\nPlease select the Backup option to make a back up. Then select the Verify Backup option and verify your backup. Encrypted PDF Backup You are about to back up your encrypted private keys to a PDF document.\nThe PDF document can safely be shared using email or with file-sharing apps you have installed, such as Dropbox. This is because your keys are encrypted. This is the random password with checksum used for encrypting this backup. This is your only opportunity for viewing the password for this backup.\nYour next backup will use a different password.\nWrite it down and keep it safe! Preparing encryption key… Encrypting private keys… Creating PDF document… PDF document created Sharing PDF document… Mycelium Wallet Backup Your Mycelium wallet backup is attached.\n\nFollow these simple steps to secure your funds:\n1. Print the PDF document.\n2. Write the 15-character password from the display of your Android device to the blue boxes of the printout.\n3. Verify that you can import the private keys to your Mycelium Wallet.\n4. Store the printout in a safe place. Share PDF Share with… Bitcoin Bitcoin Cash Private Key Decryption You are about to decrypt a password protected private key. Enter the 15 character password and checksum. The checksum is invalid. Please verify. Preparing decryption key… ERROR: Your device does not have enough memory to complete this task Share Payment Request Share Bitcoin Address Optional Amount Show QR Code Accounts Balance Transactions Address Book Scan QR Code Going to www.mycelium.com Add Address Add Account Add Fiat Account This page is locked Unlock Lock Secure My Funds Ignore Warnings Do you want to ignore warnings explaining that this legacy account holds funds? Explore obtaining location… About Mycelium License Mycelium Special Thanks ZXing License Android PDF Writer License https://github.com/mycelium-com/wallet Source Repository Version Developed by Homepage https://mycelium.com This app is provided to you for free by Feedback No camera permission Cancelled Help Invalid Password The password you entered is not valid.\nDo you wish to try again? Send Bitcoins You are about to decrypt a BIP38 password protected private key. Enter the BIP38 encryption password. The password entered is not correct. Display password Decrypt Change Language You cannot add a private key to the address book.\n\nYou can import private keys in the Accounts tab Alert ALERT\n\nYour device runs Android version 4.1.1 and has a critical bug known as Heartbleed.\n\nThis bug allows an attacker to read the memory of any apps on your device that make HTTPS connections.\n\n You should take immediate action!\n\n1. Move your funds to new addresses where the private key has never been on an Android 4.1.1 device.\n\n2. Upgrade your device to another version than 4.1.1 or use another device. Buy Sell Edit This feature requires your device to be able to tell its current location. It seems that your device cannot do that. Try enabling location services in your device settings. Creating Trader Account You are using Local Trader for the first time and need to enter a few details.\n\nChoose the account you wish to use for your Local Trader identity: Use Enter your trader nick name: name The name you chose is already taken. Please choose another name You cannot trade with yourself Create This page shows your trade ads.\n\nThe list is currently empty.\n\nClick the + button to create one. This page shows your active trades.\n\nCompleted trades move to the Trade History tab. Buy Bitcoin Sell Bitcoin Active Trades Trade History My Ads My Info Create Ad Creating Advertisement Editing Advertisement Do you wish to buy or sell bitcoin: Choose the location where you wish to trade: Choose the base price: Choose the premium you wish to add on top of the base price: Approximate price for one bitcoin: Choose the fiat currency you accept: Choose the minimum amount to trade: Choose the maximum amount to trade: Optional description of your order: The description is too long Trade with me because… Sell Bitcoin Buy Bitcoin Ad created Ad edited Local Trader Local Trader Buy/Sell Bitcoin peer-to-peer Play Sound on Trade Activity Play a notification sound when trade activity occurs Use email for notifications Use Miles for Distances Use miles instead of kilometers for distances Local Trader account detached An error occurred Your wallet needs an upgrade to use this functionality %1$s Km %1$s Miles Omnipresent Just now 1 minute %1$s minutes 1 hour %1$s hours 1 day %1$s days Rating Expected Trade Time Less than one hour About an hour About %1$s hours Location Description Searching Creating Trade Request Refresh Market Rate Change Price Change Done Edit Description You buy at: You sell at: You pay: You get: Seller\' price: Seller pays: Seller gets: Buyer\'s price: Buyer pays: Buyer gets: %1$s Accept Offer Cash Received Stop Trade Abort Trade %1$s %2$s/BTC Type a message here Your currently selected account does not have enough funds.\nTo complete this deal you have to add more funds to your account. Delete Sell Order? Do you want to delete this sell order? transaction confidence %1$s%% Changing Trade Price You can choose another base price You can choose another premium New Price Current Price Base Price: Changing Location Enter your location or use the cross hair to get an approximation Buying Bitcoins Near Selling Bitcoins Near (Local Trader account key) (that\'s you) Detach Trader Account Detaching Account This will detach your Local Trader account from Mycelium and delete locally cached trade data. The next time you use Local Trader you can attach the same address to continue using the same trader identity.\n\nDo you wish to detach from Local Trader? Are You a Human? Please solve this captcha.\nThis is to prevent spam. Wrong solution, please try again. Don\'t show this again Your device cannot integrate with Google Play Services, and may not get automatic notifications when trade updates occur. Mycelium Local Trader New trading activity One of your Local Trader ads will soon deactivate. You are buying %1$s You are selling %1$s There is no Local Trader account associated with this wallet.\n\nA trader account is linked directly to one of your bitcoin addresses, no passwords, no hassle.\n\nCreate one now? Trader Name Local Trader ID Email Address Trader Account Age Last Activity Successful Sells Aborted Sells Total Sold Successful Buys Aborted Buys Total Bought Local Trader Commission Start Trading Enter Amount to Trade Enter Amount Active until %1$s Inactive Activate Deactivate (Per 1 BTC) Confirm Did you receive %1$d %2$s and are you ready to send the bitcoins to %3$s? Do you wish to stop this trade? Because both of you accepted the deal your ratings may get a penalty.\nDo you wish to abort this trade? Enter Location Enter city or address How to Trade Going to %1$s Buy / Sell Bitcoin Invalid chat message sent by %1$s Terms and Conditions Accept Decline Receiving Address On a successful trade your funds will go to the following address: Info Map Getting Trader Info Refreshing Market Rate The new price depends on the price formula set by the seller and the current market rates.\n\nIf you refresh the price you both have to accept the deal. Opening map Local Trader is a communication platform for arranging in-person meetings to trade bitcoin and other currencies.\n\nNever accept to exchange money without meeting the other person first. They might try to scam you. Enter your email address to get notifications when there are some activities on your Local-Trader account. Unable to retrieve Trader Info from the server We sent you a verification mail - click the provided link to activate your mail address. Enter email address Change payout address The selected target address (%s) is not spendable.\n\n You need to have the private key in a offline backup available or you will lose the receiving funds. Mycelium Marketplace Find Mycelium users in your local area who buy/sell bitcoin. Current price source is not available not available! Be your own bank: Trade face-to-face, cash only. You are using a private key with the following Bitcoin address: You have scanned a Bitcoin address. You can view the balance but not spend from it. Contains one private key. Contains %1$d private keys. Contains one address. Contains %1$d addresses. Syncing in progress: %1$s transactions retrieved Archiving Account A new Version is available Check for Update Unable to receive Version information Your Wallet is up to date with version %s Update check I will update later Get from mycelium.com Google Play Sign Message You cannot sign a message with an HD account Please enter the message that you want to sign here Copy Signature to Clipboard Share Text + Signature Signature copied to clipboard Bitcoin signed message Share Bitcoin signed message Signing Message… Error from geocoder: %s \n please try again later. Fetching info from server Set your email address to receive notifications from Local Trader Send amount was updated from QR code BitID Authentication Authenticate using BitID Sign In %1$s\n\n wants you to authenticate using the bitid protocol. Do you want to sign the request? Warning: This website will receive the callback via http. For sensitive data, https should be used. The signature is being sent. Successfully logged in at %1$s! Authentication failed!\nAn error occurred while contacting the server. We are sorry! Authentication failed, the nonce has expired.\nPlease refresh the website and scan again. Authentication failed with error:\n The connection timed out, please try again later. Server could not be reached, please check your data connection. You have been logged in to the site. You have aborted the login process. SSL Problem The following SSL problem occurred, do you want to proceed? Invalid BitID URI You cannot work on archived accounts. You are now working on this HD account. You are now working on this single address account. Unable to broadcast Creating new HD Account… Preparing wallet… Calculating Master Seed… enter word number %1$s of %2$s Word %1$s: Start Verification Delete Last Word Account Verify master seed backup by scanning the QR code. Show Unspent Outputs Unspent Outputs This page shows on which addresses the funds in the selected account are located. There are currently no funds to display. Warning: Do not put your words into the clipboard, other apps could read them and obtain your money. The backup was successfully verified. The checksum of your word list is invalid, please make sure you entered all words correctly. I have a passphrase 12 words 18 words 24 words Only select this option if you understand what it means.\nA normal Mycelium backup never includes a passphrase - this is not your PIN. Please select the length of the word list to restore and indicate whether it is protected by a password. Enter Your Password Clipboard not valid No Export Found Unable to get the current clipboard content Unable to clear the clipboard Unable to set the clipboard string Select Spending Account Enter Account Label Edit Account Label Cannot import: master seed is already configured Master Seed Backup Master Seed Verification THIS IS IMPORTANT\n\nYou are about to back up your master seed.\n\nAfter making a backup you should set a PIN to prevent anyone that briefly holds your phone from making another backup and steal your current and future funds.\n\nYou will be shown a list of words, one after another. Write those words down using pen and paper, and store them in a safe place. Next Word Show first Word Tap the button below to start Please enter the words you just wrote down, one after another, to make sure that everything is backed up correctly. You typed the wrong word, please try again Your word list backup has successfully been verified. Store the backup in a safe place, your funds depend on it!\n\nYou have not configured a PIN!\nNow is a good time to do so.\n\nYou can configure a PIN in the Settings menu. Your word list backup has successfully been verified. Store the backup in a safe place, your funds depend on it! Write down your password Wrong password, please try again YOU RPA SSW ORD ABC D TESTNET You cannot archive an unused HD account Newly generated coins Continue Show Details No SPV Module found Please install the %s spv module from Google Play. Install Close the wallet Google Play not found The word you typed does not exist in the word list Legacy Backup Create a legacy backup, containing your single address accounts. Verify legacy Backup Verify an existing legacy backup Cannot navigate to website, no browser found on phone Transaction Label You do not have any account able to spend.\n\nIn order to spend, you need an account with a private key in it. There are currently no active HD accounts or single address accounts with private keys. Please either activate or import an account holding a private key in order to spend. Select Key for Signing Playstore Link Direct\ndownload Delete Account You cannot hide a used account, but you can archive it Miner fee Transactions are sent with a miner fee to get included within the next %1s block(s) on average Low-priority Economic Normal Priority Warning: Using the low-prio fee schedule is experimental and may result in transactions that never confirm. Use at your own risk. Warning: Using the economic miner fee might take a very long time to confirm. Use at your own risk. With the normal miner fee schedule you can expect your transactions to confirm within the next few blocks. With the priority fee schedule you can expect your transaction to confirm within one or two blocks. Create Backup Chat message was copied to clipboard Total: Additional master seed Backup Sorry, an additional backup is currently not possible.\nYour PIN was recently changed.\n\nTo increase the security of your funds, we prevent you (or anyone else) to export the master-seed shortly after setting a new PIN.\n\n You have to wait for at least %1$d blocks (~ %2$s) Sorry, an additional backup is currently not possible.\nYou haven\'t set a PIN\n\nTo increase the security of your funds, we prevent you (or anyone else) to export the master-seed without having set a PIN-Code.\n\nPlease go to Settings and configure a PIN. WARNING - an additional backup is risky.\n\nYou already have exported your master seed before. If you have lost the old backup and you are not sure who might have access to it, it is very dangerous to continue to use this master seed.\n\n\nOnly keep using this master seed if you are sure all backups are safe! Okay, I understand CLR DEL If you forget your pin, you have the option to reset it after a waiting period of %s. If you forget your pin, the only option is to recover from your backup. I forgot the PIN Reset Pin For security reasons you will have to wait for about %1$s until the PIN is removed.\n\nDo you want to initiate the PIN reset procedure now? Wait %s A PIN reset is in progress. You still have to wait for %1$s until you can reset the PIN.\n\nDo you want to abort the pending PIN reset? PIN Reset in progress The share you have scanned has an invalid format. Combining Shares The shares you have imported are not compatible. You need 1 more share Unrecognized share content You need %1$d more shares. You scanned share number %1$d. Delete Trader Identity Delete This Trade Do you want to delete the information for this trade from your phone? Do you want to delete your local trader identity? All trade information and ratings will be permanently removed and can not be recovered. Reload Account Warning:\n These keys won\'t be included in your Master-Seed-Backup. You have to ensure that you have a separate backup of them. Generate new random key pair to use as BTC or BCH SA account. Generate BTC SA Account A new random private key has been generated with the following Bitcoin addresses: Shuffle might take longer to confirm Account %d %s found Please connect your device Device okay - scanning Accounts (sending %s) Trezor Cold Storage This only works if your phone supports USB-OTG (on-the-go).\n\nTo connect the device you need a USB-OTG-adapter or cable. Attach the device with its own USB-Cable on the client-side and connect the host-side with your phone. Select account to spend from Enter optional passphrase Show passphrase Trezor Import a Trezor-HD-Account Trezor: Import Account Select account to import Verify and confirm the transaction on your device. Check values calculation explanation here. Amount: To: Change to: Fee: You are sending: Total: Please plugin your device This option will import the next unused account from this device. It will only show up in other wallets if you send funds to it. Import next unused account… A new firmware is available… Device configuration Device is not initialized. You need to use a external app to setup the device before the first usage. To update the device you need an external tool, click okay to launch it. A new trezor firmware is available.\nPlease use MyTrezor.com on a PC to update your trezor. (unnamed) KeepKey Cold Storage KeepKey KeepKey: A new KeepKey firmware is available.\nPlease use KeepKey Chrome Extension on a PC to update your KeepKey. Import a KeepKey-HD-Account Please connect or tap and hold your Ledger Wallet Ledger Wallet okay - scanning Accounts Ledger Wallet Ledger Nano only works if your phone supports USB-OTG (on-the-go).\n\nTo connect Ledger Nano you need a USB-OTG-adapter or cable. Plug Ledger Nano on the client-side and connect the host-side with your phone. Select account to spend from Import a Ledger HD-Account Import Account Select account to import Amount: To: Fee: Total: Please connect or tap and hold your Ledger Wallet Ledger This option will import the next unused account from this Ledger Wallet Import next unused account… Disconnect your Ledger Wallet, connect it in another application / computer to read the keyboard second factor, then connect it again to continue Enter Ledger Wallet PIN Enter Ledger Wallet 2FA Confirm output address using your Security Card Please wait ... Ledger Unplugged AID Set Ledger Unplugged AID Invalid AID, please recheck Ledger Hardware Wallet Disable TEE support Disable Trusted Execution Environment support if present to use a different Ledger Hardware Wallet Set Ledger unplugged AID Support a different AID for ledger\nunplugged custom builds Select your currencies Show private public Warning: whoever knows this code knows all your transactions and balance for this account, but won\'t be able to spend bitcoin with it Warning: whoever knows this code can spend all your current and future bitcoin from this account Reset Pin You have entered a wrong pin.\n\n If you have forgotten your pin you can reset it. No fiat currency selected Tor network Use the tor-network to communicate with the backend servers. This improves your privacy and may route around restrictive Firewalls. But it may slowdown the performance of this app Tor network (external tor) Tor network (only https) Tor network (both) Last log entries Use https Use external tor (Orbot) Both Changelog start typing to filter list Info: All HD accounts are derived from your Master Seed - if you keep your 12-Words-Backup secure, you can restore all your HD accounts with it. Warning: You have not a confirmed backup of your Master Seed. All your HD accounts are derived from it. They are only secure and recoverable, if you have a valid and safe Backup. To: %s Tor init Install Orbot? You must have Orbot installed and activated to proxy traffic through it. Would you like to install it from Google Play? Start Orbot? Orbot doesn\'t appear to be running. Would you like to start it up and connect to Tor? Imported Retrieving next unused address… Initializing… Spend from master seed No active accounts found. This passphrase allows you to derive different accounts from the same master seed.\nIf you are not sure what this means, leave it empty. Confirmations I don\'t agree I agree Current account is watch-only - select different account. refresh Extended private key Share extended private key Warning: You are about to share your private account data. Whoever gets hold of it can access all current and future funds in your account. Do you want to continue? Extended public key Share extended public key Share Account Data Do you really want to remove this queued transaction and prevent it from broadcasting? Queued Transaction Your balance will be corrected after the next synchronisation with the network Unable to remove transaction Unable to read payment request Payment not sent - Payment request is already expired! no amount specified Unable to verify Unsigned Request Signature okay invalid Signature Fetching Payment Request Payment Request Merchant Signature Amount to pay Message Created Expires Your message to the merchant (optional) Unable to send payment to merchant-server.\n%s\n\nThe payment will not be broadcast. The origin of this payment request can not be verified, because it has no signature.\n\nPlease be very cautious, as there might be someone intercepting it and changing payout addresses. Sign with: Warning: spending unconfirmed funds Spending unconfirmed funds Your transaction uses funds which have not been included in a bitcoin block yet. If for any reason the transaction which sends these coins to you fails or stays unconfirmed, your transaction will fail or stay unconfirmed as well. unverified Recipient File not found n/a Accept Place your phone back-to-back to another NFC-enabled device to share this payment request " (over Tor)" Cancel transaction Connection could not be established, maybe the server refused to connect. Export transaction history Share transaction history Transaction history Cancel transaction Rebroadcast transaction Delete unconfirmed transaction Bump Fee (CPFP) Delete unconfirmed transaction WARNING: This will only delete the transaction from the local app. This function can not undo a transaction and can not prevent it from getting confirmed. It is only useful if the network has already forgotten the transaction because it did not confirm for a long time. In that case, you can delete it to access the funds again. You will need to synchronize after doing this. If the network still knows the transaction, it will show up again right after synchronizing.\\n\\nDo you want to delete the transaction from the local cache? Rebroadcast transaction Bump Mining Fee (CPFP) Re-submit this transaction to the server to broadcast it. This can be used if you suspect that the network has not propagated your transaction or dropped it, because it did not confirm for a long time for example. Do you want to re-broadcast this transaction? Send a transaction that increases the fee for this unconfirmed transaction.\n\nDo you want to spend %2$s to get the fee to %1$dsat/B? The transaction was successfully broadcast. Broadcast failed, please check your internet connection and synchronize your wallet. Block explorers Transaction details are looked up using the %1$s Block Explorer Allows you to find any transaction\nin the blockchain Local Trader does not work with the selected account type, please select another account. The selected account type does not work with local trader. You need to select another account to perform this trade. Sending Bitcoins via Coinapult A Coinapult account allows you to store value in various Fiat currencies and spend instantly to any bitcoin address.\nWhile you use your private keys to access it, they are under control by Coinapult, unlike your funds on normal HD accounts. Enter mail address If you provide your email address, you can file a support ticket with Coinapult by sending an email to support@coinapult.com from the email you specify. Warning: Coinapult accounts cannot complete conversion transactions that are less than %1$s of value. Amount too low, minimum withdrawal is %1$s %2$s. Set email address Setting the email address failed, please check for correct spelling and make sure your device has a working internet connection. Sending email address to Coinapult… Your email address was set, you will receive an email with a confirmation link. Please copy that link and choose \'verify email\' from the account settings, to paste the link and verify the email address is correct. Verify email address Verify your coinapult email address Please paste the verification link from your coinapult email into the text field below. paste complete verification link Sending verification link to coinapult… Your coinapult email address was successfully verified. An error occurred verifying your email address. Please make sure you copy the complete and correct verification link. Unable to create coinapult account Failed to broadcast coinapult transaction Add Coinapult Locks Account Open Coinapult Terms and Conditions To create a Coinapult Account you must agree to their Terms and Conditions Do you want to provide your mail address? Creating Coinapult account… Your Coinapult account access-key gets derived from your masterseed. If you have a valid backup, the access to your coinapult account is also included. %1$s Account Add a Critical Mass Network account Add Mass Account Store digital assets in Mycelium. Add Digital Asset Account Digital Asset Please select a Colored Coin account type Create %s Account Creating %s Account Mycelium Tokens Mass Tokens Unable to create Colored Coin account Your Colored Coin account access key is generated and stored independently from your other accounts. To be able to send %1$s token to another %1$s address you need to top up your %1$s address with a small amount of BTC which will be used to fund your transaction. You can either add miner\'s fee from any account with bitcoins every time you make %1$s transaction or top up your %1$s account with a little bit more btc so you will not have to fund (means spend on miner\'s fee) each time you make %1$s transaction. Before sending your digital assets make sure you are sending to digital assets address but not the random bitcoin address. Click here to see the procedure to restore your digital assets. "RMC bitcoin" is a "Bitcoin Single Address" account linked to your RMC account. This account allows you to spend BTC, received from the RMC pool. All new bitcoins, mined by the pool, are proportionally distributed among RMC bitcoin accounts. \n In order to protect your assets from accidentally being "burned" while spendingAmount BTC from your "RMC Bitcoin" linked account, digital assets unspent transaction outputs (UTXO) and corresponding technical transactions (so-called "dust") are not taken into account. What is it? Something wrong with google calendar Both %s and %s accounts will be deleted. If you have sent digital assets to a random bitcoin address they are not destroyed.\nIn order to retrieve them you have two options:\n1) Use Colored Coins API to manually send your assets back to the address managed by Mycelium Wallet.\n2) Submit a ticket to Mycelium Wallet support for retrieving your assets. For this service, additional charges may apply. You will receive detailed information after contacting support.\n\nIn both cases, you must own a private key of the address you have sent digital assets to. You are now working on this %s account. We intentionally deactivate My Accounts tab while you\'re managing your %1$s account. This is to prevent you from sending your digital assets anywhere else except for another %1$s account. BACKUP Backup later Backup now Use BCH module to retrieve your BCH and exchange it to BTC Congratulations! You just got a new modular multiblockain version of Mycelium Wallet!

Due to high demand, we have released Bitcoin Cash (BCH) module first.

Now you can get your Bitcoin Cash and instantly and securely exchange it to BTC.

To do so, you need to install the Bitcoin Cash module or you can do it later from Settings -> Bitcoin Cash module section. Install Bitcoin Cash module Continue without BCH Mycelium Bitcoin Cash module has been %s! installed updated> uninstalled Application restart is required in order to apply configuration changes. Mycelium Bitcoin Cash module has been installed! Now we need to sync it with the blockchain in order to retrieve your Bitcoin Cash balance.

This procedure takes some time and is performed in the background.
The more private keys you have the longer it takes, please be patient. For example, if you have around 1000 private keys, it could take more than 3 hours to reach full sync.
We will inform you when it is done.

You can always check the sync progress here: Settings -> Bitcoin Cash module.

For every BTC account with not retrieved Bitcoin Cash, corresponding Bitcoin Cash account will be created.

Go to Balance tab of your Bitcoin Cash account to instantly exchange it to BTC. We have not found any Bitcoin Cash on your BTC accounts.
We are continuously monitoring your BTC accounts and will inform you if Bitcoin Cash is found. We have found %1$s Bitcoin Cash on your BTC accounts.

%2$d corresponding Bitcoin Cash account(s) created.\nBitcoin Cash balance can be checked on the Accounts tab.

Now you can go to the Balance tab of your Bitcoin Cash account(s) and instantly exchange it to BTC. Bitcoin Cash Add Bitcoin Cash HD Account Generate BCH SA Account You can check your transactions on https://www.blocktrail.com/%s Bitcoin Cash functionality is a technology preview of Mycelium Modular Architecture. You can only instantly exchange your Bitcoin Cash to BTC right in Mycelium so far. Fully functional Bitcoin Cash module will be available soon. Special thanks to all our contributors and beta testers! Install No spendable accounts Digital Assets How is it calculated? The \"Spendable Amount\" is the account\'s balance minus the cost to spend it.\n\nThe costs depend on the number of UTXOs and the miner fee level that you chose.\n\nYou can review your UTXO count in the Accounts tab, selecting your account and then using the context menu.\n\nIf you have more than 300 UTXOs, your spendable amount might further be limited by Bitcoin\'s transaction size limit. In this case you might need more than one transaction to spend all your funds. Only spendable accounts with Digital Assets are supported for account level 0. Please use xpriv instead of xpub Your BIP32 private key does not hold any digital assets.\n\nIf you believe otherwise try to scan it again. %d addresses have been scanned Retrieving Digital Assets Colored Coins service is unavailable! Please check connection to your exchange source Enable APEX token Show APEX token buy option BUY APEX TOKEN SENDING\nADDRESS RECEIVING\nADDRESS What is sync? Sync is a process of retrieving your account\'s transactions from a blockchain. A number of retrieved transaction is shown upon every successful sync attempt.\n\nSync speed depends on your network connection and number of transactions. If you have thousands of transactions this process might take a couple of hours or more. What is address type? Currently, there are three Bitcoin address formats:\n1) P2PKH - Legacy, SegWit incompatible, starting with \"%1$s\"\n2) P2SH - SegWit compatible, starting with \"%2$s\". Set by default\n3) Bech32 - Segwit Native, starting with \"%3$s\"\n\nUse either P2SH or Bech32 to receive funds if you want to benefit from sending SegWit low-fee transactions later.\nBech32 is the latest and most cost-effective standard but currently less spread which might affect your privacy. Language version Updates External Services PIN Code Notifications Personalization Security and privacy Modules Currencies Transactions Mycelium services Hardware wallets Show address path Backup Fiat Currency Search Сheck in Block Explorer using the hash link above. Show the BIP44 address path for the current address on the home screen Public key Private key Warning No Orbot installed No Google Play installed on the device OK Done Cancel Error loading transactions from module Setup change address preferences Address type Legacy (P2PKH) SegWit compatible (P2SH) SegWit native (Bech32) Transaction change address type SegWit change mode Select the way SegWit transactions change will be handled P2SH_P2WPKH (legacy compatible) Bech32 (native SegWit) Privacy guard mode (default) Block explorer P2SH mode SegWit native (Bech32). Set as default Tap for Bech32 Tap for P2SH SegWit compatible (P2SH) SegWit native (Bech32) Native SegWit address will be used for change. Latest Bitcoin standard, always the smallest fee possible, might affect privacy due to Bech32 addresses still haven\'t been used widely. P2SH-P2WPKH Legacy compatible SegWit address will be used for change. Has no privacy issues. Privacy guard (default) With "mixed mode" accounts hiding change address will be even more effective. As most of the transactions have only one output we mask your output type according to destination address type. Transaction fee might be a bit higher. Starting application Migrating accounts Loading accounts Migrating %1$s account of total %2$s HD accounts Loading %1$s account of total %2$s HD accounts Migrating %1$s account of total %2$s Single Address accounts Loading %1$s account of total %2$s Single Address accounts Unfortunately %1$s firmware does not support Mycelium mixed-spending mode.

Usually when you sign transaction on your hardware device it shows you just one output - destination address. In case of mixed-spending mode you will have to sign two outputs: one destination address and the other - change address.

You are still in control of the process and hardware wallet will show that the change goes to your account.

For more information please check this Github issue Transfer to Account #%d Unfortunately, Trezor model T does not support checking if address belongs to your wallet, but it can generate a new address from your master seed and show it on the screen. For more information about this Trezor issue please check Trezor\'s GitHub.

Please verify your address on the Trezor screen and compare it with the one in the summary section. It will be used as the change address which you have to confirm as a separate output later on. Please confirm output on your %3$s.
